query:
UPDATE userModuleProgress 
SET status = 'completed', 
    videoWatched = true, 
    transcriptViewed = true, 
    assessmentCompleted = true,
    assessmentScore = 100,
    completedAt = NOW()
WHERE userId = 1 AND moduleId = 3;
